title: Spatiotemporal dynamics of land use/land cover (LULC) changes and its impact on land surface temperature: A case study in New Town Kolkata, eastern India
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Regional Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 2

Author(s): Bubun Mahata, Siba Sankar Sahu, Archishman Sardar, Rana Laxmikanta, Mukul Maity
